spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dwarf's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.
